title: Counter Culture Coffee French Press
preparation_steps: Grind 31 grams of coffee to medium-coarse consistency
Pre-warm French Press with hot water
Add 31g ground coffee to French Press

brewing_steps.instruction: Start timer and pour 496g hot water in circular motion
brewing_steps.audio_script: Start the timer. Pour 496 grams of hot water in a steady circular motion. You have 25 seconds. Wetting the grounds evenly is crucial for a balanced extraction.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Inicia el cronómetro y vierte 496g de agua caliente en movimiento circular.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Inicia el cronómetro. Vierte 496 gramos de agua caliente en un movimiento circular constante. Tienes 25 segundos. Mojar el café uniformemente es crucial.

brewing_steps.instruction: Stir gently with wooden spoon to saturate all grounds
brewing_steps.audio_script: Use a wooden spoon to stir gently. You have 30 seconds. Ensure every bit of coffee is wet to prevent dry pockets that could lead to uneven flavor.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Revuelve suavemente con cuchara de madera para saturar todo el café.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Usa una cuchara de madera para revolver suavemente. Tienes 30 segundos. Asegúrate de que todo el café esté mojado para evitar bolsillos secos.

brewing_steps.instruction: Place lid on top, do not press plunger
brewing_steps.audio_script: Place the lid on top to keep the heat in, but do not press the plunger yet. Let it steep.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Coloca la tapa encima, no presiones el émbolo.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Coloca la tapa encima para mantener el calor, pero no presiones el émbolo todavía. Deja reposar.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Now wait until the timer hits 6 minutes and 50 seconds total. This long steep extracts the deep, rich flavors characteristic of Counter Culture's method.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Ahora espera hasta que el cronómetro llegue a 6 minutos 50 segundos en total. Este reposo largo extrae los sabores profundos y ricos del método de Counter Culture.

brewing_steps.instruction: Press plunger down slowly, pour within 20 seconds
brewing_steps.audio_script: Press the plunger down slowly and steadily. Aim to pour within 20 seconds. Enjoy the rich, full-bodied result.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Presiona el émbolo lentamente, sirve en 20 segundos.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Presiona el émbolo hacia abajo lenta y constantemente. Apunta a servir en 20 segundos. Disfruta el resultado rico y con cuerpo.

what_to_expect.description: Counter Culture's French Press method emphasizes sustainability and quality. The wooden spoon prevents scratching, while the precise timing and medium-coarse grind create a balanced cup with excellent body and clarity.
what_to_expect.audio_script: Counter Culture emphasizes quality and sustainability. This method uses a wooden spoon and precise timing to create a balanced, full-bodied cup.
what_to_expect.description_es: Counter Culture enfatiza la saturación completa con agitación inicial. Esto produce una extracción más uniforme y sabores desarrollados.
what_to_expect.audio_script_es: El método Counter Culture usa agitación inicial para saturación completa. Esto produce una taza con sabores desarrollados y extracción uniforme.

notes: Counter Culture's French Press method emphasizes sustainability and quality. The wooden spoon prevents scratching, while the precise timing and medium-coarse grind create a balanced cup with excellent body and clarity.
notes_es: Método de Counter Culture con agitación inicial para saturación completa.
preparation_steps_es: Muele 28g de café a molienda gruesa.
